titleStmt.title: An exposition on that most excellent prayer in the liturgy of the Church of England called the litany Wherein all or most ot the exceptions that have been made against it, are fully answered.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Brabazon Aylmer, at the Three Pigeons against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 and running title reads: An exposition on the litany.
Advertisement on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Three Pigeons against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil
